str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Made of stone. From lithos; stony, i.e. Made of stone.
A water pot, jar, pitcher. From hudor; a water-jar, i.e. Receptacle for family supply.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: To lie, recline, be placed, be laid, set, specially appointed, destined. Middle voice of a primary verb; to lie outstretched.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Jewish. From Iouda; Judaean, i.e. Belonging to Jehudah.
From katharizo; a washing off, i.e. ablution, expiation.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Feminine Plural
str2: From chora; to be in space, i.e. to pass, enter, or to hold, admit.
A primary preposition and adverb; properly, up; but used severally, or at.
